data.text:
Hotel Restaurant Alpina in Grindelwald

We invite you to enjoy your holidays with us in the way you have always wished!

In the heart of Switzerland, in the Bernese Oberland, you can experience true enjoyment of nature and discover the surrounding mountains from their most beautiful side.

Spend a holiday in intact nature, find time for yourself and your family.

Our 3 star Hotel Alpina is centrally located in Grindelwald (1'034 m a.s.l.) and is run by the third generation of our family.

A quiet yet central location and warm hospitality await you.

The view of a fantastic mountain scenery and our wonderful sun terrace as well as the lawn invite you to relax and unwind.

Whether hiking, climbing, cycling or motorcycling in summer or skiing, snowboarding, cross-country skiing or tobogganing in winter, in the midst of this mountain landscape Grindelwald is the ideal place to escape from everyday life, relax or actively experience nature.

Enjoy your stay to the fullest and treat yourself to relaxing or active sports days in comfortable and informal surroundings.

Spend your holiday in Grindelwald, the "first health resort in the Bernese Oberland", at the foot of the Eiger, MÃ¶nch and Jungfrau triumvirate.

Rooms for well-being

Our quietly situated rooms offer you a perfect place to relax and 'decelerate'.

Experience the peace and quiet of the Hotel Alpina in Grindelwald. Both our hotel (with elevator) and the restaurant are wheelchair accessible.

From each room you can enjoy a magnificent view of the surrounding mountains.All south rooms have a balcony.

Room overview

Restaurant Edelweiss-Stube

Our restaurant is widely known for its good cuisine, which in its versatility meets every taste.

In addition to traditional and regional cuisine, we also offer unusual culinary specialities. In the Restaurant Edelweiss-Stube gourmets and connoisseurs will find everything their heart desires.

Let yourself be seduced by seasonal dishes, fine wines and enjoy a few nice hours in a stylish ambience.

Restaurant Edelweiss-Stube

Hospitality is written big with us

Whether in our cosy 3-star hotel, in our restaurant or at the bar - let us and our team spoil you and use our individual service offer to make your free time as pleasant as possible.

Start your day with a healthy and rich breakfast and let yourself be pampered by our team in the afternoon, after an eventful holiday, whether on skis in winter or after hiking and mountain biking in summer, with a hot 'Schoki' or a pleasant cappuccino and simply enjoy a wonderful time in our idyllic Grindelwald, the most beautiful mountain village in Switzerland.

Best price guarantee

You will find an overview of our arrangements under Prices & Offers and this is guaranteed at the best price for direct bookings.

We are looking forward to seeing you!

Your host family

Regula and Thomas Wolf-Stucki

with Luke, Saskia and Nicolas.

P.S.: For enthusiasts and interested people you will find here something about the history of our hotel and our model railway permanent exhibition.
